demandcomments: In addition to the Monthly Rate, the Customer will pay $0.50 for each kilovolt-ampere of Reactive Demand in excess of 40% of the maximum Demand. Such charge is separate from and in addition to the Minimum Charge specified.
description:
This optional schedule is applicable to Large Nonresidential Customers who have chosen to receive
service from an Electricity Service Supplier (ESS), and: 1) served at Secondary voltage with a
monthly Demand that does not exceed 200 kW more than once in the preceding 13 months; or 2)
who were receiving service on Schedule 38 as of December 31, 2015.
energycomments:
Adjustment = 102 Regional Power Act Exchange Credit + 105 Regulatory Adjustments + 
108 Public Purpose Charge + 109 Energy Efficiency Funding Adjustment + 110 Energy Efficiency Customer Service + 115 Low Income Assistance(first 1,000,000kwh) + 
122 Renewable Resources Automatic Adjustment Clause + 123 Decoupling Adjustment + 125 Annual Power Cost Update +
126 Annual Power Cost Variance Mechanism + 128 Short-Term Transition Adjustment + 
135 Demand Response Cost Recovery Mechanism + 137 Customer-Owned Solar Payment Option Cost Recovery Mechanism + 
142 Underground Conversion Cost Recovery Adjustment + 143 Spent Fuel Adjustment + 145 Boardmen Power Plant Decom + 146 Colstrip Power Plant Operating + 
149 Environmental Remediation||
This rate may be subject to Daily Price Option

name: Large Non-Residential Optional Time-Of-Day Direct Access Service (Rate 538)
